argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | crhmsubc.c | |- C = ( U i^i CRing ) |
| 2 |  | crhmsubc.j | |- J = ( r e. C , s e. C |-> ( r RingHom s ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( RingCat ` U ) |`cat J ) = ( ( RingCat ` U ) |`cat J ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_crhmsubc | |- ( U e. V -> J e. ( Subcat ` ( RingCat ` U ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_subccat | |- ( U e. V -> ( ( RingCat ` U ) |`cat J ) e. Cat ) |
